name: Dojies - Alpha Demo
description:
Welcome to the Dojies Demo!

The demo includes Player vs AI mode!

Early access currently includes player vs player mode.

DOJIES

Dodgeball meets pong with a side of bullet hell.

FAST, INTENSE, EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER.

LOCAL CO-OP up to Four players, and AI players.

Customizable game modes and an assortment of maps.

Controller required.

Dojies is a casual, arcade, virtual sports game. Dojies is all about dodging. In the classic game mode, two players are pitted against each other in an arena. This arena is slowly filling with orbs. Players must avoid the opposing players orbs, while redirecting their orbs. Over time, the arena becomes saturated with orbs, it's only a matter of time before one of the players takes the round!

Navigate the bullet-hell virtual sports arena.

Create your own strategies for surviving.

Maybe you are an expert dodger, maybe you're all about the kill.

Utilize portals and special orbs to your advantage.

Welcome to Dojies!
